info.name: OOOH DAMN hot damn lads @Carboxyl i gotta say i gotta say it something is about to be said Unfin the map you be careful with it i sense that this may be one of the next greatest maps of all time don't fuck it up spend as much time as yo ucan with it be real slow real slow slide it in slowly DON'T EVEN SUBMIT IT THIS THREAD SUBMIT IT NEXT THREAD SPEND LOTS OF TIME go slow but holy shit this map is gonna be good great things are coming to Unfin or whatever you plan on calling it just give me author credits because when this map is successful i want people to think I made it "@03z what are these great things that are happening to Unfin" it'll be like dz3 v2 basically @Carboxyl it's got a really nice classic feel to it and i don't mean classic like "Mode 7 feels classic" i'm talking like the map reminds me of a bit of Boosts, a bit of DZ3, a bit of Wormy like proper classic it's real old school one thing though you're gonna be like "damn this is too chasey" which it absolutely is but don't butcher the map so that you can make it not chasey focus more on making it fun chasing it's a good opportunity to add some kinda really new and really wicked defensive mechanism which you just don't see a lot of now like when Velocity introduced the button bomb into spikes
info.author: Carboxyl
